EngLawName: Fee-charging Standards for the Cleaning and Maintenance of the Scenic Areas Managed by East Coast National Scenic Area Headquarters, Tourism Administration, Ministry of Transportation and Communications
name: 交通部觀光署東部海岸國家風景區管理處所屬景區入園清潔維護費收費標準

articles.content: These Standards are enacted in accordance with Subparagraph 2, Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
The scenic spots within the jurisdiction of this Headquarters for which entry fees are charged, and the fee standards, are shown in the attached chart.
These Standards shall take effect on the date of promulgation.
